title: Non-verbal hypnosis and Magnetism for a deep inner connection / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
These images are from the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass of Dr. Paret. Mesmerism, also known as animal magnetism, is a concept that has its roots in the work of Franz Anton Mesmer, a German physician who developed the theory that there exists a natural energetic transfer between all living things. He believed that this transfer, which he called "animal magnetism", could be harnessed to promote physical and mental health in individuals. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
